#labels Phase-Requirements
= Phase 1 Setup base project such that all embedded frameworks work out of the box =

1) Verify Create operation is working via a Test Servlet (Ensures that Spring/Hibernate Setup is correct)

2) Check Spring transactions are being applied

3) Make maven build profiles such that Tests can be run on a InMemory Database

4) Enable/Configure Spring Security

5) Create Base Exception Handling classes and example code utilising JEHA

6) Enable/Configure Unit/Integration Testing framework (Phase 2 will include utility classes for Testing)
